name: Nova Roma
startIntroPart1: We come in peace! Or not...
declaringWar: Resistance is futile, soon enough you will be a part of the Empire.
defeated: How is it possible? Rome was never meant to fall!
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: Receive a free Social Policy each time you complete a Factory, Public School or Hospital in the capital
May buy [National Wonder] buildings with [Faith] for [1] times their normal Production cost
[+2 Science, +2 Food, +2 Gold, +2 Science, +2 Culture, +2 Happiness, +2 Faith] [in capital]
